mapper.sql: TASKS_ID, TASKS_SCENARINO_ID, ERROR_STATUS, SCENARINO_START_DATE, SCENARINO_END_DATE, RANGE_DAY, STEPINDEX, TASKS_END_DATE, SOURCEID, CALCTYPE, PSAL, SSAL, MEICCITYCONFIG, BEIZHU, BEIZHU2, BEIZHU3, STOP_STATUS, SEND_TIME, END_TIME, START_MODEL_RESULT, STOP_MODEL_RESULT, CONTUNUE_STATUS, PAUSE_STATUS, EXPAND1, EXPAND2, EXPAND3, EXPAND4, EXPAND5, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into T_TASKS_STATUS (TASKS_ID, TASKS_SCENARINO_ID, ERROR_STATUS, SCENARINO_START_DATE, SCENARINO_END_DATE, RANGE_DAY, STEPINDEX, TASKS_END_DATE, SOURCEID, CALCTYPE, PSAL, SSAL, MEICCITYCONFIG, BEIZHU, BEIZHU2, BEIZHU3, STOP_STATUS, SEND_TIME, END_TIME, START_MODEL_RESULT, STOP_MODEL_RESULT, CONTUNUE_STATUS, PAUSE_STATUS, EXPAND1, EXPAND2, EXPAND3, EXPAND4, EXPAND5, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{tasksId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenarinoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scenarinoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rangeDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stepindex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tasksEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meiccityconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beizhu3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startModelResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopModelResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contunueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pauseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expand1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expand2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expand3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expand4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expand5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update T_TASKS_STATUS
TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ERROR_STATUS = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENARINO_START_DATE = #{scenarinoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCENARINO_END_DATE = #{scenarinoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RANGE_DAY = #{rangeDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STEPINDEX = #{stepindex,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASKS_END_DATE = #{tasksEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALCTYPE = #{calctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSAL = #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSAL = #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEICCITYCONFIG = #{meiccityconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIZHU = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIZHU2 = #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIZHU3 = #{beizhu3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_STATUS = #{stopStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
START_MODEL_RESULT = #{startModelResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_MODEL_RESULT = #{stopModelResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTUNUE_STATUS = #{contunueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAUSE_STATUS = #{pauseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPAND1 = #{expand1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPAND2 = #{expand2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPAND3 = #{expand3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPAND4 = #{expand4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPAND5 = #{expand5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TASKS_ID = #{tasksId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_TASKS_STATUS set TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERROR_STATUS = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENARINO_START_DATE = #{scenarinoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCENARINO_END_DATE = #{scenarinoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RANGE_DAY = #{rangeDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEPINDEX = #{stepindex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASKS_END_DATE = #{tasksEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALCTYPE = #{calctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSAL = #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSAL = #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEICCITYCONFIG = #{meiccityconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU2 = #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU3 = #{beizhu3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOP_STATUS = #{stopStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_MODEL_RESULT = #{startModelResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOP_MODEL_RESULT = #{stopModelResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTUNUE_STATUS = #{contunueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAUSE_STATUS = #{pauseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPAND1 = #{expand1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPAND2 = #{expand2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPAND3 = #{expand3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPAND4 = #{expand4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPAND5 = #{expand5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TASKS_ID = #{tasksId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_TASKS_STATUS set SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALCTYPE = #{calctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSAL = #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSAL = #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEICCITYCONFIG = #{meiccityconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
update T_TASKS_STATUS set BEIZHU2 = #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select TASKS_ID, TASKS_SCENARINO_ID, ERROR_STATUS, A.SCENARINO_START_DATE,A.SCENARINO_END_DATE, A.RANGE_DAY, STEPINDEX, TASKS_END_DATE, SOURCEID, CALCTYPE, PSAL, SSAL, MEICCITYCONFIG, BEIZHU, BEIZHU2, BEIZHU3 from T_TASKS_STATUS A LEFT JOIN T_SCENARINO_DETAIL B ON A.TASKS_SCENARINO_ID=B.SCENARINO_ID WHERE B.PATH_DATE = #{pathdate} AND B.SCEN_TYPE=#{type} AND B.USER_ID=#{userId}
